main event: An observer experienced a flash of light and a loud roar while inside her home.
interesting points: The observer was not outside and did not directly see the object., The windows lit up in a flash of light., No UFO report was concluded from this incident., There was very little information available to draw a conclusion., The observation lasted for a matter of seconds.
sighted object: unknown object near the observer's home
witness description: Mrs. ***, a civilian resident of Centerville
